response: it is essential to protect our personal information regarding data privacy in this digital era. it is challenging for people who are unaware of how their data is being used by various companies and governments. social media platforms like twitter collect a lot of personal information from us without our knowledge. we need to be aware of the consequences before posting on social media. we need to think twice before sharing anything online. people should educate themselves about digital privacy laws and regulations, which safeguard their rights in the digital world.
